tools.name: Terraform
tools.description: Open-source infrastructure as code software tool that enables defining and provisioning infrastructure across multiple cloud providers using declarative configuration files

tools.name: AWS CloudFormation
tools.description: AWS service for modeling and provisioning cloud resources using infrastructure as code templates in JSON or YAML format

tools.name: Pulumi
tools.description: Open-source infrastructure as code tool that allows developers to define infrastructure using familiar programming languages like TypeScript, Python, Go, and C#

tools.name: Ansible
tools.description: Open-source automation tool for configuration management, application deployment, and task automation using a simple YAML syntax called playbooks

tools.name: Chef
tools.description: Configuration management tool that uses Ruby-based DSL to write system configurations as code, ensuring servers are consistently configured across the infrastructure

tools.name: Puppet
tools.description: Configuration management tool that automates the provisioning and management of infrastructure using a declarative language to define system configurations

tools.name: SaltStack
tools.description: Configuration management and remote execution tool that uses a high-speed data bus to communicate with nodes and provides real-time system updates

tools.name: Crossplane
tools.description: Open-source Kubernetes add-on that extends the Kubernetes API to provision and manage cloud infrastructure and services using Kubernetes custom resources

tools.name: Cloudify
tools.description: Open-source cloud orchestration platform that automates the deployment, scaling, and lifecycle management of applications across multiple cloud environments

tools.name: Istio
tools.description: Open-source service mesh that provides a uniform way to connect, secure, control, and observe microservices across Kubernetes clusters

tools.name: Linkerd
tools.description: Lightweight service mesh for Kubernetes that adds security, observability, and reliability to applications without requiring any code changes

tools.name: HashiCorp Consul
tools.description: Service networking platform providing service discovery, configuration, and segmentation functionality with a service mesh solution
